messages.message:
Hello yall, I wanted to float this idea around regarding observability, logging and tracing in IBLLM.
Currently we use the default `logging` package, yet there exist newer packages (with not too many additional dependencies + stable + no vulnerabilities) that promise additional features such as

1. `loguru` https://codecut.ai/simplify-your-python-logging-with-loguru/ (very nice exception handling, which might help us debug better in `model-service` , minimal code changes required)
2. `structlog` https://www.structlog.org/en/stable/getting-started.html  (very nested control, though seems overkill for our case)
I really like the loguru package, it seems like logging in steroids and iti is a an easy replacement
